hasBalance

public boolean hasBalance(UUID uuid)
Checks whether the player has a balance or not. You probably won't need this method.

Parameters:
uuid - The UUID of the player to check the balance of
Returns:
Whether the player has a balance or not

getBalance

public int getBalance(UUID uuid)
Fetches a player's balance. Will return 0 if they don't have a balance.

Parameters:
uuid - The UUID of the player to get the balance of
Returns:
The player's balance

setBalance

public void setBalance(UUID uuid,
                       int balance)
Set's a player's balance to the specified integer. NOTE: If you're adding to the balance, subtracting from the balance, or paying another player with the funds from this balance, please use one of the convenience methods below.

Parameters:
uuid - The UUID of the player to set the balance of
balance - The integer to set their balance to

canAffordWithdrawal

public boolean canAffordWithdrawal(UUID uuid,
                                   int amount)
Checks if a player can afford a withdrawal of the specified amount. Run this before doing any withdrawals!

Parameters:
uuid - The UUID of the player you plan to withdraw from
amount - The amount you plan to withdraw
Returns:
Whether the player can afford the withdrawal

withdrawPlayer

public void withdrawPlayer(UUID uuid,
                           int amount)
Withdraws the specified amount from a player's balance. WILL THROW AN EXCEPTION IF YOU ATTEMPT TO WITHDRAW MORE THAN THE PLAYER HAS!

Parameters:
uuid - The UUID of the player to withdraw from
amount - The amount to withdraw

depositPlayer

public void depositPlayer(UUID uuid,
                          int amount)
Deposits the specified amount into a player's balance.

Parameters:
uuid - The UUID of the player to deposit to
amount - The amount to deposit

payPlayer

public void payPlayer(UUID sender,
                      UUID reciever,
                      int amount)
Pays a player the specified amount from another player's balance. WILL THROW AN EXCEPTION IF YOU ATTEMPT TO PAY MORE THAN THE PLAYER HAS!

Parameters:
sender - The player to withdraw from
reciever - The player to pay with the withdrawn funds
amount - The amount to pay
